entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
